meanings.definition: A person whose name is forgotten or not known.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I ran into whatshisname from the store.
meanings.sent2: I can't remember whatshisname who helped us fix the car last week.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone kept calling me whatshisname as a joke.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the mysterious hero was always referred to as whatshisname.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked us to find whatshisname in the class photo.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to someone whose name one cannot recall.
meanings.sent1: Whatshisname is the one who borrowed my book.
meanings.sent2: I need to return the book to whatshisname.
meanings.sent3: Whatshisname always brings delicious snacks to the office.
meanings.sent4: The team is waiting for whatshisname to join the meeting.
meanings.sent5: Whatshisname left a note on my desk about the project.
